acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

addFeedId(string,bytes32).details: The feed id is defined by the third-party oracle

params._feedId: The feed id of the token price
params._pairName: The price pair name (e.g. CORE/USDT  BTC/USDT)
The price pair name (e.g. CORE/USDT  BTC/USDT)

returns.price: The EMA price of the price pair

params._pairName0: The first price pair name (e.g. CORE/USDT  BTC/USDT)
params._pairName1: The second price pair name (e.g. CORE/USDT  BTC/USDT)

returns.price0: The EMA price of the first price pair
returns.price1: The EMA price of the second price pair

getFeedId(string).details: The feed id is defined by the third-party oracle

params._pairName: The price pair name (e.g. CORE/USDT  BTC/USDT)

returns.feedId: The feed id of the token price

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._oracle: The address of the third-party oracle contract (e.g. Pyth or Switchboard)

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

addFeedId(string,bytes32).notice: Adds mapping between price pair name and feed id

getEmaPriceByPairName(string).notice: Get the EMA price of the tokens by pair name

getEmaPricesByPairNames(string,string).notice: Get the EMA prices of two tokens by their pair names

getFeedId(string).notice: Gets the feed id of the token price by price pair name
